Package com.ltsllc.miranda.cluster

Class MessageCache

java.lang.Object
com.ltsllc.miranda.cluster.MessageCache
public class MessageCache extends Object
A cache of messages This class contains both in core Messages and Messages on disk. It provides a single interface to get both online and offline Messages.

    • isOnline

      public boolean isOnline(UUID uuid)
      Is the Message in core memory?
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID that the caller is asking about
      Returns:
      Whether the message is online, or false if we don't know

    • get

      public Message get(UUID uuid) throws IOException
      Get a Message regardless of where it is.

      NOTE THAT THE MESSAGE MUST EXIST IN THE CACHE! This method get an online or offline message.

      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the message
      Returns:
      The message
      Throws:
      IOException - If the temp file is not found or if skip throws an Exception

    • add

      public void add(Message newMessage) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Add a Message to the cache
      Parameters:
      newMessage - The message to add.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If there are problems accommodating the new message. This method also throws the exception if the new message's contents are larger than the load limit.

    • remove

      public void remove(UUID uuid) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException, IOException
      Remove a message from the cache

      NOTE: this method expects the message to be in the cache. It will try to delete the message from offlineMessages.

      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the message to remove.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If there is a problem removing the message.
      IOException

    • putMessage

      public void putMessage(Message message) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Put a new message in the cache

      NOTE: the message must not already be in the cache.

      Parameters:
      message - The new message.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If the "new" message is already in the cache; o if there is a problem putting it in the cache.

    • migrateLeastReferencedMessage

      public void migrateLeastReferencedMessage() throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Migrate the least referenced Message to the offline temp file
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException

    • migrateInCoreMessageToOffline

      protected void migrateInCoreMessageToOffline(Message message) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Migrate the designated message to the temp file

      All the variables, e.g. uuidToOnline, are updated to reflect this.

      Parameters:
      message - The designated message. This message must be present in uuidToMessage.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - The method throws this if there is an error opening offlineMessage or if there is an error writing to the file, or the UUID does not exist in uuidToMessage

    • readOfflineMessage

      protected Message readOfflineMessage(UUID uuid) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Read a Message from the offline file

      NOTE: the file must exist in uuidToLocation for this method to work.

      Parameters:
      uuid - The message to read. This UUID must exist in uuidToLocation
      Returns:
      The specified message
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If there is a problem opening the file, or reading the message.

    • migrateMessageToOnline

      public void migrateMessageToOnline(UUID uuid) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Migrate an offline message to online

      The UUID must exist in uuidToLocation. All the variables, e.g. uuidToMessages are updated to reflect this.

      Parameters:
      uuid - The Message to read.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If the uuid does not exist in uuidToLocation, or there is a problem accessing the Message.

      public boolean contains(UUID uuid)

      public void undefineMessage(Message message)

      public long getLocationFor(UUID uuid)

      public static boolean shouldRecover()

    • copyAllMessages

      public List<Message> copyAllMessages() throws IOException, com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Make a copy of all the messages

      This method returns an independent list of messages.

      Returns:
      The new list of messages.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If there is a problem copying the messages
      IOException - If these is a problem copying the messages

    • recover

      public void recover()
      Try to recover from a crash.

      The message cache looks for the file specified by Miranda.PROPERTY_OFFLINE_MESSAGES and, if it exists, the class tries to take it as its offline messages file. It cannot recover those messages that were in memory when the crash occurred: those are lost.

    • removeNulls

      public void removeNulls()

    • clearMapping

      public static void clearMapping(Map map)
